CWEs: CWE-209: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
description: The function is vulnerable to Information Disclosure and Denial of Service attacks. In the case of an error, the function throws the error object which might expose sensitive information (CWE-209). Also, the function does not limit the number of tasks that can be pushed into the 'tasks' array, which can lead to excessive consumption of system resources (CWE-400).
